title: Rustic Studio — Meadow View
description: Cozy studio with a kitchenette and writing desk, opening to gentle meadow views. Perfect for solo travelers or couples seeking a peaceful countryside stay.

title: Premium 1-Bedroom — Sunset Over Fields
description: Spacious one-bedroom with a cozy fireplace, farmhouse-style fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony facing golden fields at dusk. Ideal for longer stays and remote work.

title: Family 2-Bedroom — Farmhouse Wing
description: Comfortable two-bedroom annex to the farmhouse with open-plan lounge, dining nook, and covered porch. Great for families seeking nature trails and village life.

title: Compact Studio — Countryside Retreat
description: Quiet, compact studio along a leafy village lane featuring a kitchenette, queen bed, and smart storage. A great-value base for hikes, farm visits, and local markets.

title: Luxury Loft — Valley Sky Terrace
description: Top-floor loft with panoramic valley views, a private roof terrace, gourmet kitchen, and timber-beam finishes. A statement countryside stay for special occasions.

title: Garden-Level 1-Bedroom — Courtyard Access
description: Relaxed one-bedroom opening onto a private courtyard herb garden, with open-plan living and a well-equipped kitchen. Ideal for couples or remote workers seeking quiet.
